# EXIM Procurement Vendors

## Field List

| Field Name        | Description                                                                                         | Mandatory |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| Vendor ID         | The unique ID used to identify a vendor in the database.                                            | No        |
| Vendor Name       | Name of vendor                                                                                      | Yes       |
| Vendor Email      | Vendor email address                                                                                | Yes       |
| Contact Person    | Contact person                                                                                      | Yes       |
| Designation       | Contact person designation                                                                          | Yes       |
| Phone Number 1    | Vendor phone number                                                                                 | Yes       |
| Phone Number 2    | Vendor phone number                                                                                 | No        |
| Vendor Address    | Vendor Address                                                                                      | Yes       |
| FAX               | Vendor FAX                                                                                          | Yes       |
| Prequalified      | This field indicates whether or not this Vendor has passed all of EXIM Bank's criteria for vendors. | Yes       |
| Vendor Categories | This field is a table containing all categories this particular vendor falls under.                 | Yes       |
| Vendor            | This is a dropdown of all available Vendor records in the database that can be updated.             | Yes       |
